AML Reference Dataset

Source: R/data.R
triana_et_al_condensed.Rd

An AML single cell reference dataset produced by Triana et al. 2021. This is a small subset of the original data that is intended for use with automated tests.

The dataset includes a pheresis and a bone marrow sample from a single young healthy donor. A panel of 462 genes is included in the dataset, along with 197 surface protein markers. A UMAP projection based on gene expression was computed from the original Seurat object downloaded from Figshare (see source below). The cell types provided by Triana et al. were condensed into 10 generalized cell types, and the object was randomly downsampled to include 25 cells from each cell type.

Usage

triana_et_al_condensed

Format

A Seurat object with 659 features and 250 cells in 2 assays. Included assays:

RNA

mRNA expression data for 462 genes used as markers for hematopoietic stem and progenitor (HSPC) cell types at varying stages of differentiation.

AB

Surface protein expression data for 197 surface protein markers associated with HSPCs.

Source

https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/Expression_of_197_surface_markers_and_462_mRNAs_in_15281_cells_from_blood_and_bone_marrow_from_a_young_healthy_donor/13398065/2
